content: C'mon man...I have a very close friend in WV. Just wanted to help out here too. There is not even one. This is what happens to the red states every time. I understand the process. I get it. I will head to the swing states.
Don't be discouraged! We actually have multiple people from WV on the server! The sidebar only shows you who is online at the moment.
That is a relief to know - thank you so much. Feeling a little beat up today. I needed that - thank you again

This is just a reminder that you can sign up to phone bank, canvass, get trainings  or take other actions at https://events.democrats.org/ in your state or in one of our battleground states (NC, PA, GA, NH, WI, PA, MI, AZ, NV). Volunteers like you make all the difference! We look forward to seeing you at an event soon.
How is Glenn doing against Justice?
Hello WV!
I’m not sure, but with the popularity Justice has, i think it’s no contest unfortunately
Hi all! Trying to figure out how this works, can you help me share? https://www.instagram.com/stories/tmf.aidanator/
## [West Virginia Voter Information](https://www.vote.org/state/west-virginia/)
Pinned a message.
Hello all!
Hello I am proud to support the Harris/Walz ticket.  Proud West Virginian.
Yay fellow West Virginians \o/

Hi - proud WV native and voting for Harris/Walz.  Would like to help with GOTV, but having trouble connecting with anyone working on that in the Clarksburg/Bridgeport area.  Are we doing mailers/phone banks/anything in WV this year?

Please keep an eye on the <#1242249109298221069> channel. They share daily social posts and events to join to get involved with the national campaign for harris. I encourage you to share on your social channels or text those links to any of your friends who you think would want to join. It is important that your friends in WV are seeing these posts. Even if at first they just scroll past, we need to help the computers notice that there is interest growing there.

Glenn Elliott’s campaign is fighting an uphill battle, but gaining a little steam now that word is getting around that Jim Justice is making life miserable for his Greenbrier employees.  https://www.cbsnews.com/amp/pittsburgh/news/union-rep-says-west-virginia-governor-late-on-paying-worker-health-insurance-bills-despite-denials/

Am doing postcard outreach for OH and TX, but would also love to help do something in WV.  At some point, the Democratic Party needs to stop ignoring our state - we are fertile ground for Dem politics, but there is literally nowhere to get any info from anyone on volunteering in any way here.  It is a sad state of affairs in the Mountain State in terms of dem politics these days.

I hear you, thats why I'm trying to start something here even tho I live in VA. Can you join me in identifying who else from WV is here and we can start making a plan. I'm currently reaching out to some friends and trying to see if I can find if there is anything at all going on that I can connect you to. I have been looking for about an hour and have not found anything. This means we may need to start with inviting people to join this virtual office. I can start reaching out to folks who are organizing in places close to WV, would you be able to invite other WV who would be receptive so we can have both a team coming in and a team to help meet people where they are. Ill go knocking on doors with you/whatever you think would be best received by folks who may not want to canvass but may be receptive to our message.

Good News! Mike Pushkin is the Chair of the West Virginia Democratic Party and a Democratic member of the West Virginia House of Delegates representing District 37 since 2014. Update: The VA dems are finishing up a plan that rolls over from the work they were doing together at the DNC. I offered to start building up the volunteers here. They are just getting back from the conference and checking in with their families. We can expect a strategy roll out ASAP next week. Lets start inviting folks to join us here https://events.democrats.org/event/654007/
https://www.americanprogress.org/article/biden-administration-investment-tracker/

Hello. Native of WV but living in Pittsburgh. There’s lots to do up here, obviously, but I’m trying to reach out in WV as well. I agree with your overall sentiment that nationally the Dems should stop ignoring WV. At the state level, I’m not sure what organization is like.     The recent Jim Justice news motivated me a lot, and I’m hopeful it may have changed some minds on him. I reached out to the Elliott campaign and am going to phone bank for him - they’ll welcome more help, FYI, if you’re interested.

<a:star_wave:1269735420359606369> Hey, Team! We know you want to help make a difference! Did you know though that hosting a debate watch party is an amazing way to get involved and bring people together? <a:rainbow_heart_scribble:1269029739432120465> It’s all about good vibes, great conversations, and getting folks fired up for the election. Your watch party could be the spark that motivates someone to vote! <a:PinkFlames:1252802562659193004>  [Register your watch party](https://events.democrats.org/c/host-a-debate-watch-party/event/create/) to get access to all sorts of resources for throwing a successful debate watch party, including a [Host Information Session](https://events.democrats.org/event/677337/). <a:ThanksRainbow:1278765693579431967>

**Strict Fundraising Rules (it’s the law):**
We can only fundraise on behalf of: Democratic National Committee, Harris Victory Fund or Harris for President directly. 
We can recruit for "non-official events" that are hosted by partner organizations or volunteers in ⁠non-official-events-only. We can recruit into anything that is listed on events.democrats.org or a state democratic party's mobilize.
Rule 3 Note > Relevance: Do not post links to petitions or other calls to action that haven’t been approved by Staff. This forum is not intended for debates. Additionally, do not attempt to raise funds or share fundraising links for any entity besides the Democratic National Committee. Using this server to raise funds for yourself, another candidate, or another organization violates campaign finance law and is strictly prohibited. Anyone who violates the rules is subject to removal or time out.
When in doubt, ask @Community Moderator.

<:mega2:1269006580976976076> A reminder that we have a dedicated ⁠https://discord.com/channels/1242249109298221066/1288163431911788586 Reddit channel where we coordinate our efforts to post campaign content, leave comments, and upvote <:kamala1:1269028302203523114> <:WalzSmile:1270424129853456445> -related posts. Let's help people find information about our candidates and the brighter future they offer! Head on over to our channel and we'll plug you in with opportunities to contribute. Even if you have just one minute to help, you can make a difference.

<@&1245911007684067372>  October 15 is the last day to register to vote online, in-person, and by mail in West Virginia!  Can you take a second today to make sure you and your network are all set to vote?
Here’s what you can do:

1. Reach out to everyone in your network with this message, that can also be found in Reach: 

October 15 is the last day to register to vote online, in-person, and by mail in West Virginia!  I’m reaching out to everyone I know to make sure their registration is up to date. This election is too important to miss. Will you check your registration status? Here’s the link: https://IWillVote.com/WV

2. Share this image on your social media! It can also be found in Reach! ✨ Make sure you’ve joined Reach for campaign updates here: https://app.reach.vote/join/7DRDMN
3. Check your own registration, at IWillVote.com/WV. 
React with ✅when you’ve done it!
🗳️ 🗳️ 🗳️

In celebration of Kamala's birthday lets trade candles for calls and gifts for gumption! We're trying to reach over 3 million voters today! Can you help?  Knock out some calls while you are drinking your morning coffee and still be out in time to hit up a pumpkin patch! Join the [5M Dial-a-thon](https://events.democrats.org/event/730026/) and help make history!

**Courage is mastery of fear, not absence of fear.** Which [**Phone Bank with Team Harris-Walz**](https://events.democrats.org/event/725393/?utm_source=Discord&utm_medium=Posts&utm_campaign=Daily%20Engagement) are you signing up for right now?

<@&1245911007684067372>  FOLKS, WE LOVE YA, AND YOUR DEDICATION TO THIS CAMPAIGN! WHAT IS OF IMMEDIATE HELP RIGHT NOW IS TO  HOP ON THE DIALER **RIGHT NOW** AND HELP US GET TO 5 MILLION CALLS!!! 

WE ARE LESS THAN 600K AWAY FROM IT, AND WE CAN DO THIS, BUT WE NEED ***ALL OF YOU TO HELP US GET THERE!***

HOP ON THE DIALER RIGHT NOW AND CALL SOME AWESOME WISCONSIN VOTERS: https://democrats.call.scaletowin.com/?t=f80c83d9-aa81-404c-9137-bbd269d6b1c7&ref=discord

Happy Monday!
